original_text: Paul gathered a pile of brushwood and, as he put it on the fire, a viper, driven out by the heat, fastened itself on his hand.
korean_text: 바울이 나무 한 묶음을 거두어 불에 넣으니 뜨거움으로 말미암아 독사가 나와 그 손을 물고 있는지라

sentences.original_text: Paul gathered a pile of brushwood
and, as he put it on the fire
a viper, driven out by the heat
